thumb.title: みょんちゃん（魂魄妖夢）のスイカ割り BGM Till When? （東方妖々夢より）潮見ひろ（ピカP）様アレンジ
thumb.description: 夏なので東方Project一推しキャラ、みょんちゃん（魂魄妖夢ちゃん）の浜辺でビキニ姿を描きました。彼女の剣技でスイカ割りは目隠ししても一撃で割る、「斬れないものなどあんまりない！」 ^_^As it's summer, I have illustrated Myon-chan (Youmu Konpaku), my most favourite character in Touhou Project, wearing bikini on the beach. Her sword skill smashes a watermelon in one go, "... Things that cannot be cut (by this Roukanken * forged by Youkai) are next to none!" * Not Roukanken in this case: It's a simple wooden sword. ^_^ Illustration is posted in my pixiv page https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/132371135BGM: https://commons.nicovideo.jp/works/nc52765Touhou project is produced by ZUN and Shanghai Alice Fantasy Band
